snippet.title: CHASING THE STARS TRAILER
snippet.description:
Chasing the Stars is a Boys Love  Visual Novel by Ertal Games.

In a retro-futuristic world, humankind is starting to conquer the space, while our protagonist feels stuck on Earth and dreams of joining this historic moment. Will he have what it takes to achieve his goal?

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/763990/Chasing_the_Stars
Itchio: https://ertal-games.itch.io/chasing-the-stars
Website: https://www.ertalgames.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ertal77
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZUFsg9v
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ertal
